titleStmt.title: Some observations and annotations upon the Apologeticall narration, humbly submitted to the Honourable Houses of Parliament; the most reverend and learned Divines of the Assembly, and all the Protestant Churches here in this island, and abroad.
titleStmt.author: Steuart, Adam.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Christopher Meredith, and are to be sold in Pauls Church-yard at the sign of the Crane,

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: A.S., i.e. Adam Steuart.
A reply to: An apologeticall narration, humbly submitted to the honourable Houses of Parliament.
With a preliminary permission to print.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Pauls Church-yard at the sign of the Crane
